title: zakservers
author: zakservers
content: Zak Servers is pleased to announce that we have not started to accept USDT as a payment method along with BTC for our offshore servers, we do provide 24/7/365 customer support with guaranteed 15 mins response time, 100% uptime guarantee, 12 offshore locations choice and enhanced offshore privacy.\https://www.zakservers.com

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: zakservers on May 05, 2023, 11:12:04 AMZak Servers is pleased to announce that we have not started to accept USDT as a payment method along with BTC for our offshore servers, we do provide 24/7/365 customer support with guaranteed 15 mins response time, 100% uptime guarantee, 12 offshore locations choice and enhanced offshore privacy.\https://www.zakservers.comI have seen you have a customer support (live chat) service. In this case, I think the response should be faster than you have mentioned. 15 minutes should be taken if you are too popular and have too many requests on the live chat.

comments.author: zakservers
comments.body: Hi, Actually we do provide only sales support via live chat, and that is instant, as we do not want any confusions regarding the tech tickets, so tech support is provided via tickets, email, phone and if any emergency then live chat sales can communicate to the tech department too, so 15 minutes guaranteed response time means that if you open a support ticket, our tech department will start working on it within 15 minutes, mostly our tech team response time is within 5 minutes, still we guarantee 15 minutes as we do not want anything that can be wrong.Thanks for your update and question.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: zakservers on May 05, 2023, 11:25:05 AMHi, Actually we do provide only sales support via live chat, and that is instant, as we do not want any confusions regarding the tech tickets, so tech support is provided via tickets, email, phone and if any emergency then live chat sales can communicate to the tech department too, so 15 minutes guaranteed response time means that if you open a support ticket, our tech department will start working on it within 15 minutes, mostly our tech team response time is within 5 minutes, still we guarantee 15 minutes as we do not want anything that can be wrong.Thanks for your update and question.It is great that you have well-planned about the support of your customers/users. It is very good that you are providing support via almost all the way namely tickets, email, phone as well as live chat support. Hope you will continue this type of support.
